about_the_game:
With the call of duty, the sleeping soldiers will be awakened to steal secret documents, assassinate enemy leaders, rescue their comrades, at the cost of their own lives, but for the revolution!It was all worth it!
  • Select a lurk character and begin the quest.
  • You can exterminate an enemy behind his back without even noticing it.
  • Victory is won when you successfully rescue a prisoner, steal secrets, or assassinate a leader and escape.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains strong language and extreme violence.

detailed_description:
With the call of duty, the sleeping soldiers will be awakened to steal secret documents, assassinate enemy leaders, rescue their comrades, at the cost of their own lives, but for the revolution!It was all worth it!
  • Select a lurk character and begin the quest.
  • You can exterminate an enemy behind his back without even noticing it.
  • Victory is won when you successfully rescue a prisoner, steal secrets, or assassinate a leader and escape.
legal_notice: All materials are owned by WHM studio, no unpacking, no infringement.
name: Lurk And Rouse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Shader model 3.0，NVidia 7600，ATI X1600

short_description: With the call of duty, the sleeping soldiers will be awakened to steal secret documents, assassinate enemy leaders, rescue their comrades, at the cost of their own lives, but for the revolution!It was all worth it!
